price: «ሰማያትንና ምድርንም ማን ፈጠራቸው» ብለህ ብትጠይቃቸው «አሸናፊው ዐዋቂው (አላህ) በእርግጥ ፈጠራቸው» ይላሉ፡፡
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ خَلَقَهُنَّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunna khalaqahunna al-ʿazīzu al-ʿalīmu
